name: Stoked (itch)
description:
Light the way for souls the world has lost.
  • The world has gone dark, lost to the Seekers, and your flame is what they seek.
  • Keep your fire lit or you, too, will be swallowed by the darkness.
  • Seekers will try to douse your fire. If they succeed or you forget to stoke your flame in time,  it's game over.
  • Thousands have been lost to the darkness. But you can save their souls.
  • Enlist the help of Gatherers, Souldiers, and Keepers to collect and protect Lost Souls.
Controls
  • Use your mouse to point and click.
  • Hover over the bottom of the screen to access the shop. 
  • Press escape to pause.

Credits

SFX

Stoked was developed during Ludum Dare 51 within 72 hours.
